xdmaps_g.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains a configuration table where each entry is a configuration structure for an XDmaPs device in the system.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who     Date     Changes
 ----- ------ -------- -----------------------------------------------
 1.00  hbm    08/19/2010 First Release

#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xdmaps.h"

Variables

XDmaPs_Config XDmaPs_ConfigTable []

Variable Documentation

XDmaPs_Config XDmaPs_ConfigTable[]
 

Initial value:

 {
        {
                XPAR_XDMAPS_0_DEVICE_ID,
                XPAR_XDMAPS_0_BASEADDR,
        },
}
Each XDmaPs device in the system has an entry in this table.
